local RotationSystem = SimpleClassUtil:class(ISystem)

function RotationSystem:initialize()
    ISystem.initialize(self)
end

function RotationSystem:getEventHandleMap()
    return {
        [EventType.Event_Battle_Render_Turn] = "moveTurnHandle",
    }
end

function RotationSystem:moveTurnHandle(data)
    local entity = self:getEntityByUid(data.uid)
    local orientation = data.orientation
    if entity and orientation  then
        local z =  BattleUtils:getLocalZ(orientation == Enum_Battle.Orientation.Left )
        entity:setScaleZ(z)
    end
end

return RotationSystem
